TABLE.NAME: local_imtt
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the main table for the IMTT plugin.

FIELD.NAME: configuration_json
FIELD.COMMENT: This is a JSON-encoded configuration for the IMTT plugin

FIELD.NAME: token_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the foreign key field for the local_imtt_token table

KEY.NAME: token_id
KEY.COMMENT: This is the foreign key for the token_id field

TABLE.NAME: local_imtt_token
TABLE.COMMENT: This table is going to store tokens for authenticated users

FIELD.NAME: provider_name
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the name of the provider of the token. For example: "google"

FIELD.NAME: provider_access_token
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the access token from the provider
